Title: WP7 Catto Free App - Windows Phone 7 .NET Silverlight Sample App
Description:
WP7 Catto Free App - Windows Phone 7 .NET Silverlight Sample App

This is a WP7 app that is a free sample of examples. Currently the app is running in the emulator and supports a few nice features of the phone such as orientation, input scope, control of the back button.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WP7 Catto Free App - Windows Phone 7 .NET Silverlight Sample App

This is a WP7 app that is a free sample of examples. Currently the app is running in the emulator and supports a few nice features of the phone such as orientation, input scope, control of the back button.


This project has many features that I'd like to add, I plan to check in the future

This project is here to help people including myself learn about WP7, I thank you for checking it out. All feedback welcome.
thx,
Catto
